original_title: Benny Hill: The Lost Years - The Good, the Bawd and the Benny
overview: Part 3 of 3, featuring sketches never broadcast in America, this hilarious medley contains vintage material from Benny when his cheeky humor established him as one of England's funniest - and naughtiest - comedians. Filled with riotous musical send-ups, fractured fairy tales, wacky commercial spoofs and pitch-perfect impressions, this collection captures the vast range of one of England's most inspired comics!
title: Benny Hill: The Lost Years - The Good, the Bawd and the Benny
